scripts.build: rm -rf .cache dist elm-stuff; elm-optimize-level-2 src/elm/UI.elm --output src/optimized.js && parcel build src/index.html --public-url .
scripts.buildForBenchmark: rm -rf .cache elm-stuff dist; elm-optimize-level-2 src/elm/UI.elm --output src/optimized.js && parcel build --no-minify src/index.html --public-url .
